import React, {useState} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { createRecipe } from "../actions"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; export default function CreateRecipe(){ let dispatch = useDispatch(); const[input,setInput] = useState({ name:"", tipodeplato: "", healthscore: "", imagen:"", summary: "", pasoapaso: "", diets: [] }) const submitHandler=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); dispatch(createRecipe(input)) } const handleChange=(e)=>{ console.log(e) console.log([e.target.name]) console.log([e.target.value]) setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } const handleChangeB=(e)=>{ if(e.target.checked){ setInput({ ...input, diets:[...input.diets, e.target.name] }) }else{ setInput({ ...input, diets:input.diets.filter(d => d !== e.target.name) }) } } return(

Create new recipe

Diets:
If you don´t know which diet your recipe corresponds to, please check here
) }
